transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. Hello. Sir vanakkam sir. Sir India martle irunthu call pannirukken sir. I ask.
Customer: Kekuthunga?
Executive: Kekuthu sir. Kaalaila actually Gipson pesiruntharu unga kitta. Like neengume WhatsAppla oru edho wrongaa pesinathunala unga rendu per interaction sariyaa pogalengrathunala avar mela edho not satisfied engarathukku kuduthirukkeenga. Actually enna problemnu therinjukalaamaa sir?
Customer: Illa puriyala enathu?
Executive: Morning unga kitta enga teamla irunthu Gipsonnu oruthar pesirunthaar illaiyaa? Neethi actually.
Customer: Aamaa. Aamaa.
Executive: Pesurathukku appuram ungalukku vanthu athukana feedback onnu vanthu WhatsAppla neenga receive pannirukkeenga. Regarding vanthu avaru sariyaa pesinaraa illaiyaangrathukkaaga. Athu vanthu not satisfied engara maari kuduthirukkeenga. Sir neenga avaru edho thappaa pesinaraangalaa?
Customer: Avaru okay thaan. Illa illa avaru okay thaan avaru pesurathu.
Executive: Sari naan maathi kuduthirukken. Feedback kuduthirukkeenga.
Customer: Appidinglaa okay. Illa ippo enakku enna show aaguthu appidinaa neenga avanga rendu per interaction productiveaa pogala like not satisfied engarathu.
Executive: Avar sidela edho complaint illaiyaa?
Customer: Illa illa avaru complaint illa complaint. Ennaannaa enakku vanthu ethume ithu aagala. Order edhum convert aagala. Athai eththanaiyo per pesinaanga naan evlo koodiyae sollirukken. Oru onnum enakku theriyala.
Executive: Okay okay illa neenga kudutha not satisfied engarathu athula clear interaction relatedaa irunthaa potrukkum. Neenga athu not satisfiednu kodukka poga avaru mela ithuvaayirukkum sir.
Customer: Okay enna problem sir athu solla mudiyumaa? Naan athu support panna.
Executive: Avaru edhum antha vishayam illa avaru okay thaan.
Customer: But ennaannaa enakku vanthu lead ethume sariyaa convert aagala. Naan neraiya per pesinaanga. Avanga ellaathukkum send pannitten.
Executive: Okay. Yen sari enna maathiri response kidaikkuthu?
Customer: Response illa. Naan ippo 10 buyleads varuthunnaa athula six vanthu fake thaan. Summaa search pannuravanga mattum thaan enakku vanthu buyleadsla varuthu.
Executive: Okay. Okayinglaa? Innaikku morning kooda oru buylead vanthu eduthu pesunaen Asannu ninaikkiraen. But avanga search thaan panninaanga. Avanga product ennaannaa pesala.
Customer: Summaa search panni paathurukkaanga avlothaan. Just for time pass antha maari. Naan athukku naan pay pannanum. Enkitta enna solli ithu panninaanga India martla neenga buylead confirm aana buylead mattum thaan varum. Ethume varaathu athu appidiye orderaa convert aagura maathiri thaan antha buylead varumnaanga. But intha maari vanthuchunnaa enakku moththathile oru naalukku oru buylead thaan. Neenga ippidiye aaru buylead pochuannaa appuram enna panna mudiyum?
Customer: Appathukku enakku paathaa oru 30 leadsla vanthu oru 20 leads vanthu wasteaa thaan irukkum.
Executive: Hmm hmm puriyuthu.
Customer: Athu enna purposeku use aagum? Athai thaan convert pannamudiyum. Ippo vanthu athu ethukkum illa.
Executive: Hmm purinjuthu sir purinjuthu sir. Saringa like naan onnu panren sir. Namma rendu per venaa oru Google meetla meet pannalaangalaa? Ithu actually naan avarudaiya manager thaan call pannirukken Gipsonudaiya manager thaan. Naan ungalukku ithu sort out pannarathukku oru sila vishayangal naan ungalukku vanthu support panren. Okayinglaa? Ithu ithu enna maathiriyaana oru expectationoda namma ithu vanthu correctaa kaiyaalanum appidingarathu ellaame naan ithu panren. So namma rendu per oru Google meetla meet pannumbothu innuthu konjam clear enakku support panna mudiyum. Naan athai meet panni kudukkiraen. And morning.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Enga morning enga teamlirunthu pesumbothu edho oru GST relatedaa like addressume change pannumnu maari solliruntheenga sollisonnaanga. Athula edhaavathu changes irukkaangalaa?
Customer: Aamaa athu neraiya pannirukken. But unga document kettaanga document India martla group something onnu open pannirukkom athai share panniralaam. Sari addressum athu. Ippo location vanthu Thoothukudinnu irukkum ippo antha location vanthu Chennaiyila pannara maari kaavanthu fullaave.
Executive: Oh right right puriyuthu.
Customer: Sari ippo vanthu ungalukku GSTla.
Executive: Illa GSTla enna enna solreenga sir?
Customer: GSTla rendu address irukkuthu. Rendu address irukkuthu Thoothukudiyile address onnu. Aamaa saringa. Rendu address maari inga vanthu fullaa warehouse ellaame irukkum. Inga vanthaa material ellaam move aagum. Sari address ellaam move panniralaam. Change panniralaam antha address thaan ithu avlothaan.
Executive: Okay sir naan ippo Thoothukudiyilirunthu Chennaiyila maathi kuduthaa ungalukku okaynglaa athu?
Customer: Aa okay okay.
Executive: Okay sir naan ippo maathirren ungalukku athu konja nerathula ungalukku athu maaridum okayinglaa? And athu maarunathukku appuram ungalukku Gipson message poduvaanga neenga athu mattum check pannirunga. And ippo neenga antha complaint vanthu Gipson mela rise aachilla neenga vanthu avaru sariyaa pesalengrathunala athu interaction ithuvaachinnu irunthuchilla athukku relatedaa vanthu paatheengannaa.
Customer: Avaru pesumbothu not satisfiednu avaru avaru onnum theriyaathu naan India martkku thaan kuduthaen not satisfiednu appa avaroda voice appuram onnu satisfiednu kuduthaen.
Executive: No issue sir namma ithu connect pannuvom India martkku mela neenga vanthu not satisfiednaalume athu onnume problem thaane. So namma athai kandippaa connect pannalaam Google meetla connect panni enna ethungarathu discuss panni properaa namma athukana action plan create pannalaam. And ippo naan antha ticket close panren sir avaru mela vantha complaint close panren ungalukku athukana feedback mattum receive aagum sir mailla. Ippo marupadiyum antha feedback varum athu mattum konjam paarunga naan ungalukku address change pannirathukku appuram ungalukku avaru message poduvaarunga address change aayiruchinnu solli neenga athukku appuram cataloglayume check pannikkonga change aayiruchaaangrathu mattum.
Customer: Sari okay.
Executive: Saringlaa neenga avarukku GST kuduthutteengannu sonnaaru naan antha GSTla additional address vachi naan panni kuduthurren saringlaa? Okay okay sir naan vanthu avarudaiya manager thaan so in case edhaavathu avar sidela edho support illa illa India martlayume ungalukku support illa appidinaa neenga directaa enakke call pannunga naan support panren sir.
Customer: Sari okay.
Executive: Rightinglaa okay sir okay sir thank you sir thank you so much.
Customer: Sari okay.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Customer received fake buyleads.
- No orders are being converted.
- Wants to change GST address.\n
\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive apologized for the fake buyleads.
- Agreed to a Google Meet to discuss the issue.
- Will change the GST address from Thoothukudi to Chennai.\n
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Executive will close the ticket.
- Customer will receive a feedback mail.
- Executive will change the GST address.\n
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
None\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Satisfied\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- buyleads, gst, address change, google meet, complaint\n
\n
